```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(flexdashboard,ggplot2,plotly,tidyverse,crosstalk)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Diamonds Chart

```{r}
shared_diamonds_plot <- SharedData$new(diamonds)
p1<-  ggplotly(shared_diamonds_plot %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cut, group=cut, fill=cut))+
  geom_bar()+theme_classic()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Cut"))
p1
```

> Source: Diamonds dataset

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Dimaond Frequency by Carat

```{r, message=FALSE, error=FALSE}
p2 <-  ggplotly(shared_diamonds_plot %>% 
            ggplot(aes(price,colour=cut))+
            geom_freqpoly(binwidth=500)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Count")+xlab("Price"))
p2
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset

### Interactive Linear Model

```{r}
p3 <- ggplotly(shared_diamonds_plot %>% 
           ggplot(aes(carat,price))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(se=TRUE)+theme_minimal()+ylab("Price")+xlab("Carat"))
p3
```

>Source: Diamonds dataset
